base_description: Rectangular black and gray soap dispenser.
part_description: Consists of a rectangular base and a pump on top. The base is gray on one side, black on others. The pump is black and centered.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism connects to a tube inside the rectangular base. When pressed, the pump creates suction, drawing liquid soap up through the tube and out the spout.
external_interaction_description: The dispenser is operated by pressing the pump, which dispenses soap onto hands or other surfaces. It can be refilled by unscrewing the pump and pouring soap into the base.
